definition: United Kingdom 聯合王國|联合王国[Lian2 he2 wang2 guo2]/United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland/abbr. for England 英格蘭|英格兰[Ying1 ge2 lan2]
South Korea (Republic of Korea)/Han, one of the Seven Hero States of the Warring States 戰國七雄|战国七雄[zhan4 guo2 qi1 xiong2]/Korea from the fall of the Joseon dynasty in 1897

sentences.english: Theme song from Saiunkoku Monogatari anime.
Vedanta defines the real as being permanent and the unreal as being temporary.
sentences.chinese: 韦丹塔界定真正作为常任理事国和虚幻是暂时的。

sentences.english: Following that, the two heads of state jointly met with journalists from the media of China, Chile and other countries.
sentences.chinese: 随后两国元首共同会见了中智两国和国际传媒记者。

sentences.english: The Government of Japan will receive further signatures, as the Depositary of the ACTA.
sentences.chinese: 作为协定受托国，日本国政府将负责接收进一步签名。

sentences.english: China's rise has been on everyone's lips in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 近年来，国崛起成为街谈巷议的话题。

sentences.english: Graphics on screen The Kingdom will return to Jerusalem and It will be ruled over by a marvellous King.
sentences.chinese: 神的国将回到耶路撒冷，由一位了不起的王作统治。

sentences.english: South Africa Has Beautiful Scenery, Mild Climate , "Rainbow Country"Good Name.
sentences.chinese: 南非风景娟秀，天气温顺，有“彩虹之国”的美称。

sentences.english: The diplomatic relations between the two countries have been ruptured.
sentences.chinese: 两国外交关系已经断绝。

sentences.english: In fact we need to kick Turkey out of NATO.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，我们需要把土鸡国踢出北约。

sentences.english: Indian and Russian officials say the two prime ministers held wide-ranging discussions.
sentences.chinese: 印度和俄罗斯官员说，两国总理就议题了磋商。

sentences.english: On others, such as global warming, the two countries are at opposite ends of the spectrum.
sentences.chinese: 在全球变暖等其它问题上，两国更是处于对立的两级。

sentences.english: For the kingdom of God is not in word, but in power.
sentences.chinese: 因为神的国不在乎言语，乃在乎权能。

sentences.english: It will take place on the day of the Lantern Festival on the Yanshui Junior High School athletic field.
sentences.chinese: 这些活动将在元宵节当天于盐水国中操场进行施放。

sentences.english: At times like these, words can fail even the most seasoned polyglot.
sentences.chinese: 碰到这样的情况，即使精通多国语言，也会变得词穷。

sentences.english: Only when the country becomes powerful and prosperous can families become rich.
sentences.chinese: 有了强盛的国，家才会富起来。

sentences.english: But honey is not the stickiest issue dividing the two countries.
sentences.chinese: 但是蜂蜜并非导致两国产生分歧的最大问题。

definition: abbr. for 國民大會|国民大会, National Assembly of the Republic of China (extant during various periods between 1913 and 2005)/abbr. for 新加坡國立大學|新加坡国立大学, National University of Singapore (NUS)/abbr. for 印度國民大會黨|印度国民大会党, Indian National Congress (INC)/abbr. for 馬來西亞印度國民大會黨|马来西亚印度国民大会党, Malaysian Indian Congress (MIC)
within the borders/internal (to a country, province, city etc)/domestic
